comment.brief: The min/max layout constraints are ignored and the preferred aspect correct size is used
comment.full: The min/max layout constraints are ignored and the preferred aspect correct size is used

comment.brief: The size will be adjusted to fit first within the maximum, then to meet the minimum size requirements. The aspect ratio is preserved.
comment.full: The size will be adjusted to fit first within the maximum, then to meet the minimum size requirements. The aspect ratio is preserved.

comment.brief: The size is trimmed, or expanded, to meet the minimum/maximum layout constraints. The desired aspect ratio is not preserved.
comment.full: The size is trimmed, or expanded, to meet the minimum/maximum layout constraints. The desired aspect ratio is not preserved.

comment.brief: Applies the Preserve and then Trim rules. This is the default.
comment.full: Applies the Preserve and then Trim rules. This is the default.

comment.brief: The size is trimmed, or expanded, to meet the minimum/maximum layout constraints. The desired aspect ratio is not preserved.
comment.full: The size is trimmed, or expanded, to meet the minimum/maximum layout constraints. The desired aspect ratio is not preserved.
